body: The two boys got suspended. Kasumi continue exploring her sexuality. Even though the teacher got smaller dick than her second boyfriend, but the situation really excites her. In the end, the teacher asks if she’s ready to cross over the thrill of almost getting caught, but actually exposing herself. Apparently, the teacher had done more than 50 girls before, although he still take care to cover up their face. In the end, Kasumi got too excited and she took off the mask on her own. Her two boyfriends said they’re done with her after seeing the stream, but she doesn’t care.
